thread.title: Very handy, clean, well run hotel
thread.title_full: Very handy, clean, well run hotel - Review of Hotel Duret, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: theobeard
title: Very handy, clean, well run hotel
text: Was really impressed with the accessibility and how close the metro was. Room has everything you need and is to a high standard. Would definitely stay here again. Only bad thing is that the hotel is quite noisy with traffic outside and also in the hallway outside the room as the rooms are very close together.
